scripts.preinstall: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify({ ...require('./package.json'), dependencies: ['lib', 'app'].map(p => require('./' + p + '/package.json')).reduce((o, p) => ({ ...o, ...p.devDependencies, ...p.dependencies }), {}) }))"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(require('./package.json'), (k, v) => k === 'dependencies' ? undefined : v, 2))"
